MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge, affecting properties in Crammond Avenue and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. We now expect your supply to be restored by 6AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.52PM on 17th February 2021.
